src:
Ljubka Alexis Bledel je varnostna grožnja
Igralkino ime letos največkrat povezano z okuženimi spletnimi stranmi. Zanimanje za zvezde resničnostne televizije upada.
01 Nov 2019, 18:11 by T. P.



guliver/cover imagesNajvečjo grožnjo na spletu predstavlja Alexis.



Sophie Turner vzbuja zanimanje zaradi serije Igra prestolov.



Resničnostne zvezde, kot sta Kourtney in Kristin, imajo vse manj oboževalcev.



Lani so ljudje najbolj brskali za Ruby Rose.


Naj vas njena ljubkost in prikupnost, s katerima je Alexis Bledel v seriji Midve z mamo ukradla srca televizijskih gledalcev, ne zavedeta. V svetu zvezdniških imen namreč ni bolj nevarne osebe od modrooke lepotičke!


Resničnostne zvezde, kot sta Kourtney in Kristin, imajo vse manj oboževalcev.

Tako je dognalo podjetje za kibernetsko varnost McAfee, ki želi ljudi opozoriti, da brskanje po spletu in klikanje na nepreverjene povezave ni le nedolžna prostočasna zabava, saj na uporabnike spleta v virtualnem svetu preži nešteto pasti.Sploh klikanje na strani z vsebinami o priljubljenih zvezdnikih, najsi gre za videoposnetke in fotografije ali članke, ki so priljubljeno leglo zlonamernih programov in virusov. In v tem letu je bilo prav Alexisino ime najpogosteje povezano z okuženimi spletnimi stranmi. 
Nevarne piratske vsebine
Alexis, ki jo ljubitelji serij minula tri leta zvesto spremljajo v nagrajeni Deklini zgodbi, je torej zasedla nelaskavi prestol zvenečih imen, ki so v kibernetskem svetu največja grožnja. Na lestvici pa ji sledijo televizijski voditelj James Cordon, zvezdnica že kultne serije Igra prestolov Sophie Turner, igralka Anna Kendrick in oskarjevka Lupita Nyong'o, voditelj Jimmy Fallon, zvezdnik akcijskih filmov in mojster borilnih veščin Jackie Chan, raperja Lil Wayne in Nicki Minaj ter vzhajajoča zvezdica in igralka filmskih hitov Marvelovega vesolja Tessa Thompson.Z raziskavo je podjetje McAfee želelo opozoriti na nevarnost klikanja na nepreverjene in sumljive vsebine, pri čemer so v posebni skupini visokega tveganja piratske vsebine. »Spletni uporabniki se verjetno ne zavedajo v celoti, da se z brskanjem po spletnih vsebinah izpostavijo tveganju, kot tudi ne razumejo povsem morebitnih posledic, ko za dostop do določenih strani predajo svoje podatke,« poudarja Gary Davis iz podjetja.


Sophie Turner vzbuja zanimanje zaradi serije Igra prestolov.

Pri tem pa tudi razloži, da sta Bledelova in Turnerjeva pristali tako visoko na lestvici tveganja najverjetneje zaradi izjemne priljubljenosti serij Deklina zgodba in Igra prestolov, v katerih igrata, televizijska voditelja Cordon in Fallon zaradi viralnih posnetkov pogovornih oddaj, Lupita Nyong'o pa je letošnja pogosta tarča spletnega brskanja zaradi filma Vojna zvezd.Priljubljenost in odmevnost posameznih zvenečih imen se iz leta v leto spreminja, skladno s tem pa se spreminja tudi internetno zanimanje zanje. Kajti če je letos največja spletna grožnja ljubka Alexis, je ta nezavidljiva čast leto prej pripadla Ruby Rose, ki je leta 2018 vzbujala zanimanje v prvi vrsti zaradi upodobitve stripovske superjunakinje Batwoman v istoimenski seriji.
Vloga v seriji Deklina zgodba je Alexis prinesla emmyja.
Iz primerjave letošnje in lanske najnevarnejše deseterice pa je tudi razvidno, da je močno upadlo zanimanje za zvezde resničnostne televizije. Kristin Cavallari in Kourtney Kardashian sta namreč še lani predstavljali resno internetno grožnjo, letos pa sta iz naj desetke padli globoko na 214. in 222. mesto.
text:
Cute Alexis Bledel is a security threat
The actress' name this year is mostly associated with infected websites. Interest in reality television stars is on the decline.
01 Nov 2019, 18:11 by T.P.



gulliver / cover imagesAlexis is the biggest online threat.



Sophie Turner is sparking interest in the Game of Thrones series.



Reality stars like Kourtney and Kristin have less and less fans.



Last year, people were most browsing for Ruby Rose.


Don't be misled by her loveliness and charm with which Alexis Bledel stole the hearts of television viewers in the Midve series with her mother. There is no more dangerous person in the world of celebrity names than the blue-eyed beauty!


Reality stars like Kourtney and Kristin have less and less fans.

That's how McAfee, a cybersecurity company, wants to warn people that browsing the web and clicking on unverified links is not just innocent fun, as it traps countless pitfalls in the virtual world of the web. be it videos and photos or articles that are a popular litter of malware and viruses. And it was during this year that Alexis's name was most often associated with infected websites.
Dangerous Pirate Content
Alexis, who has been faithfully followed by fans of the series for the past three years in the award-winning Girl's Story, has thus occupied the incomplete throne of sounding names that are the biggest threat in the cyber world. The list is followed by television presenter James Cordon, star of the already cult series Game of Thrones Sophie Turner, actress Anna Kendrick and Oscar-winner Lupita Nyong'o, presenter Jimmy Fallon, action movie star and martial arts master Jackie Chan, rapper Lil Wayne and Nicki Minaj, and rising star and Marvel Universe hit movie actress Tessa Thompson.With the research, McAfee wanted to warn of the dangers of clicking on unverified and suspicious content, with specific high-risk groups being pirated content. "Web users are probably not fully aware that they are putting themselves at risk by browsing the web, nor do they fully understand the potential consequences of submitting their information to certain pages," points out Gary Davis of the company.


Sophie Turner is sparking interest in the Game of Thrones series.

He also explains that Bledel and Turner have landed so high on the risk scale, most likely because of the immense popularity of the series The Girl's Story and the Game of Thrones in which they play, television presenters Cordon and Fallon due to viral recordings of talk shows, and Lupita Nyong'o is this year's a common target for web browsing because of the movie Star Wars. The popularity and popularity of individual sounding names changes from year to year, and so does internet interest in them. Because if the biggest online threat this year is the lovely Alexis, this unenviable honor a year earlier belonged to Ruby Rose, who in 2018 has aroused interest primarily because of the portrayal of comic book superhero Batwoman in the eponymous series.
A role in the series Girl's Story, Alexis brought in an Emmy.
A comparison of this year's and last year's most dangerous top ten shows that interest in reality television stars has dropped significantly. Kristin Cavallari and Kourtney Kardashian posed a serious internet threat last year, and this year they dropped from the top ten to 214 and 222 respectively.
